'''Otto Boffin''', colloquially known as '''Otto the Fat''', was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Otto was the only child of [[Bosco Boffin]]. He married [[Lavender Grubb]] and had four children: [[Hugo Boffin|Hugo]], [[Uffo Boffin|Uffo]], [[Rollo Boffin|Rollo]], and [[Primrose Bracegirdle|Primrose]].<ref>{{App|Boffin}}</ref>
